data.title: Who Is Kim Kardashian Dating?
data.meta_description: Kim Kardashian was recently with Odell Beckham Jr but are they still together, or does she have a new boyfriend?
data.text:
Kim Kardashian was recently with Odell Beckham Jr but are they still together, or does she have a new boyfriend?

Kim Kardashian has taken a new approach to her dating life following high-profile relationships with the likes of ex-husband Kanye West and her most recent ex-boyfriend Pete Davidson, as she bids to keep her romances a little more private.

However, after enjoying months of the single life, The Kardashians star was off the market again with a brand-new boyfriend in the form of athlete Odell Beckham Jr.

Read more: Who Is Khlo√© Kardashian Dating?

Read more: Kim Kardashian's Cardigan At The Met Gala 2024 Wasn't Hiding A Wardrobe Malfunction

Sadly Kim and Odell recently called things off. So is Kim K in a relationship again? Is she dating? Here's a deep dive into all the relationship rumours.

Is Kim Kardashian dating Odell Beckham Jr?

Not anymore! After months of rumours Kim and OBJ were officially snapped together at the Super Bowl 2024 in Las Vegas. They were to have said to have made things exclusive not long after and it was confirmed that they began dating in September 2023.

However in May 2024 it was announced that they had split due to busy schedules and Kim's desire to focus on being a 'hands-on-mum', which means she is now longer dating anyone - to our knowledge.

But, who is Odell? He's a professional football player who currently plays for the Baltimore Ravens and has broken records with his sporting talent including the fastest receiver in NFL history to reach 100 career receptions.

Odell also has a son, Zydn, who was born on February 23, 2022. He welcomed him with his ex-girlfriend Lauren "Lolo" Wood who is a model and actress most famous for appearing on MTV's Wild'n'Out.

Is Kim Kardashian dating Tom Brady?

Rumours began swirling online in early July 2023 that Kim is romantically linked to NFL legend and recently single Tom Brady.

Fan speculation was fuelled when the A-listers both attended Michael Rubin's star-studded White Party in The Hamptons over the Fourth of July weekend.

However, according to PEOPLE, Kim and Tom are not dating, despite the SKIMS mogul admitting to having a crush on the athlete.

An insider said of their interaction at the party: "[They] said hi briefly when she arrived at the party," while another concurred: "Kim and Tom barely even spoke at the party and barely even said hello."

The source went on to say: "Later in the evening, Kim had some liquid courage and was overheard telling friends she has a crush on Tom."

"They are friends and have a lot of respect for each other," added another insider, "Kim is very focused on her kids and her businesses, and not in a relationship right now."

Is Kim Kardashian dating 'new man' Fred?

In a teaser for episode three of The Kardashians season three, Kim spoke about getting back out into the world of dating.

She filled Scott Disick in about a mysterious man in the clip and alluded to her inner circle setting her up on a fate, she said: "My friends wanted me to meet someone."

Scott gave the potential new boyfriend a code name, replying: "Let‚Äôs call him Fred. Does he meet the standards?"

Just by Kim's reply, it seems she's already quite smitten with 'Fred': "Oh, so meets the standards."

Us Weekly reports that the SKIMS owner hasn't made anything official but "there is somebody who she‚Äôs interested in."

The source continued: "So far, there have only been subtle flirtations between them."

In the episode Kim met the mysterious Fred at a celeb hotspot restaurant that she used to visit with ex Pete Davidson, she explained on the show: ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs, like, my spot because there‚Äôs a private room downstairs."

She revealed that headlines soon emerged claiming that she had rekindled her relationship with Pete when really she was dating an unknown man, when telling Disick the story, Kim spoke about how attractive the mystery guy was: "Drop Dead Fred."

However, the KKW Beauty owner did go on to reveal: "I just don‚Äôt want to date one person.‚Äù

Is Kim Kardashian dating Meek Mill?

The Kardashians star was romantically linked to hip-hop star Meek Mill in January 2023 after years of friendship.

It's alleged that the celebrity pair have been attending high-profile events with one another such as the Super Bowl in February and the Oscars Vanity Fairy party in March.

An insider revealed to Media Take Out, that Kim and Meek "have been in contact" but could not say if they were attending the aforementioned events ‚Äúas a couple" or not.
